function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through surface contact","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Regular surface disinfection, use of antimicrobial materials, and hand hygiene","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, UV-C disinfection, and electrostatic sprayers","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff, and visitors","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate material characterization leading to improper use of materials","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness of viricidal activity and potential safety hazards","Mitigation":"Thorough material analysis and validation, adherence to material specifications","Technologies":"Profilometer, optical microscope, and image processing software","People":"Research and testing personnel, facilities management","Owner":"Laboratory or research facility"},{"Description":"Insufficient virucidal testing leading to ineffective virus inactivation","Impact":"Failure to prevent virus transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Comprehensive virucidal testing using appropriate methods and agents","Technologies":"In vitro testing equipment, validated virucidal agents","People":"Testing personnel, researchers, and public health authorities","Owner":"Laboratory or research facility"}]}
